What options are available to the Verus RPC client?

The Verus RPC client offers several options, including:
- `-?` to display this help message
- `-conf=<file>` to specify a configuration file (default: komodo.conf)
- `-datadir=<dir>` to specify a data directory
- `-testnet` to use the test network
- `-regtest` to enter regression test mode
- `-rpcconnect=<ip>` to send commands to a node running on a specific IP (default: 127.0.0.1)
- `-rpcport=<port>` to connect to JSON-RPC on a specific port (default: 8232 or testnet: 18232)
- `-rpcwait` to wait for the RPC server to start
- `-rpcuser=<user>` to set a username for JSON-RPC connections
- `-rpcpassword=<pw>` to set a password for JSON-RPC connections
- `-rpcclienttimeout=<n>` to set a timeout in seconds during HTTP requests (default: 900)
- `-stdin` to read extra arguments from standard input

This is intended for regression testing tools    and app development.`-rpcconnect=<ip>` Send commands to node running on <ip> (default: 127.0.0.1)`-rpcport=<port>` Connect to JSON-RPC on <port> (default: 8232 or testnet: 18232)`-rpcwait` Wait for RPC server to start`-rpcuser=<user>` Username for JSON-RPC connections`-rpcpassword=<pw>` Password for JSON-RPC connections`-rpcclienttimeout=<n>` Timeout in seconds during HTTP requests, or 0 for no timeout.    (default: 900)`-stdin` Read extra arguments from standard input, one per line until EOF/Ctrl-D    (recommended for sensitive information such as passphrases)# Commands:## Addressindex### `getaddressbalance` Returns the balance for an address(es) (requires addressindex to be enabled).#### Arguments: ```json {  "addresses"   [    "address" (string) The base58check encoded address    ,...   ] } ``` #### Result: ```json {  "balance" (string) The current balance in satoshis  "received" (string) The total number of satoshis received (including change) } ``` Examples: ```bash > verus getaddressbalance '{"addresses": ["RY5LccmGiX9bUHYGtSWQouNy1yFhc5rM87"]}' > curl --user myusername --data-binary '{"jsonrpc": "1.0", "id":"curltest", "method": "getaddressbalance", "params": [{"addresses": ["RY5LccmGiX9bUHYGtSWQouNy1yFhc5rM87"]}] }' -H 'content-type: text/plain;' http://127.0.0.1:27486/ ```### `getaddressdeltas` Returns all changes for an address (requires addressindex to be enabled).
